name: TERA: Digital Deluxe Starter Pack
detailed_description:
This DELUXE digital item starter pack includes everything needed to propel you to greatness in world of TERA!

The TERA Digital Deluxe Starter Pack contains:

  • Dragonette auto-looting pet –This helpful little fella will loot the corpses of your enemies!
  • 4 Pearl Gems worth 200 gold total –Earn yourself some gold by selling these to a vendor in game for 200 gold!
  • 30 days of Elite Status –Live the high life as an Elite Status player!
  • Inventory expansion ×3 –Expand your character inventory to carry more loot!
  • Bank expansion ×3 –Expand your bank inventory to store more loot!
  • Strongbox Keys x10 –Open strongboxes dropped in game!
  • 1000 EMP store currency –Currency to spend in the TERA in-game store!

short_description: TERA’s Digital Deluxe Starter Pack brings you loads of in-game perks and items you’ll love, including:Dragonette auto-looting pet4 Pearl GemsElite Status (30 days)Inventory expansionsBank expansionsStrongbox Keys1,000 EMP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP (32-bit only), Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: AMD Athlon64 3200+ or INTEL Pentium 4 3.2ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1600T or nVidia GeForce 7600GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 (Latest Service Packs)
  • Processor: AMD Athlon64 X2 6000+ or INTEL Core 2 Duo E6750
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 3870 or nVidia GeForce 8800GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
